mapper.insert:
INSERT ALL
INTO MOVIES (MOVIEID, MOVIETITLE,SHORTPOSTER,LONGPOSTER, RELEASEDATE, OVERVIEW, POPULARITY, TICKETPRICE, MOVIECHECK) VALUES(#{item.movieId},#{item.movieTitle},#{item.shortPoster, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.longPoster, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.releaseDate},#{item.overView}, #{item.popularity},#{item.ticketPrice},#{item.movieCheck})
SELECT 1 FROM DUAL
